id {{item.name}} {{item.description}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ItemService } from '../Item.service'; import { Item } from '../Classes/Item'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ItemDetails', templateUrl: './ItemDetails.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ItemDetails.component.css'] }) export class ItemDetailsComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private itemService:ItemService) { } ngOnInit():void { this.items=this.itemService.getItems(); } items:Item[]; deleteItem(name:number){ this.itemService.deleteItem(name); this.refreshItems(); } private refreshItems(){ this.items =this.itemService.getItems(); } }
